name: Rushed Trucking
description:
You are a small truck driver with tight deadlines for delivery. If you don't get to the destination in time, you will only get payed the value of the goods in your truck. You have to drive fast through the rough terrain if you wan't to make it  in time, and will end up having to sacrifice some of the goods in your truck.

Goals of the game:

- Get to the destination before deadline

- Get to the destination with as much value as possible

- Upgrade your truck in a variety of ways.

Controls

WASD: Drive the truck

R: Restart mission

Escape: Takes you back to the menu

Credit

IamStephano: Programmer, 3D modeling & UI

ThatRumme: Level design, 3D modeling & UI

Psykodamber: Textures & sprites
